General.Name: Henan Huaying Agricultural Development Co Ltd
General.Description: Henan Huaying Agricultural Development Co., Ltd. engages in the breeding and hatching of duck business in China and internationally. It is involved in the duck/chicken slaughtering and processing; processing and sale of poultry products; and feed production activities, as well as provision of frozen products and cooked food products. It offers products under the Huaying brand name. In addition, it engages in technology development, transfer and consultation in the field of network technology, computer software and hardware technology; purchase, storage, and sale of grains; animal husbandry activities; offers leather, fur, feathers, and their products and footwear; and real estate business. The company also exports its products to Korea, Japan, Singapore, New Zealand, Europe, and internationally. Henan Huaying Agricultural Development Co., Ltd. was founded in 2002 and is based in Xinyang, China.
